name: Spaceman Sparkles 3
description: Sparkles wrecked a spaceship and got kidnapped by a mysterious Green Star, play as Magic in this new rescue adventure.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WIN7 Processor: 2500k 3.3GHz Graphics: AMD 6870 / GTX 460 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: 1080p60fps
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: Love the art style, the music and the fast pace :)

My initial thoughts were; 'Okay, A Kind Ale War kinda made me wanna check out this game.'  My reaction upon playing game; 'Okay, tight controls, chill vibes'  My reaction upon seeing first boss; 'HOLY MOTHER OF CTHULHU THIS IS AMAZING'  PROS: DANK BEATS, SWEET CONTROLS, LASERS AND RAINBOWS  CONS: YOU THINK THERE'S CONS? GET OUT OF HERE YOU VEGAN, CROSS-FITTING, POLITICALLY NEUTRAL PARTY, HIPSTER.
